thread.title: Expected more from a luxury hotel
thread.title_full: Expected more from a luxury hotel - Review of The Benjamin, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: M L
title: Expected more from a luxury hotel
text: There were light brown spots on the bed sheets. The shampoo container was empty on my first night!! Check-in staff were curt and unfriendly. There was a random bottle cap on the floor of my hotel room. I requested for candy, because I was dizzy coming back from a dinner and the front desk woman looked at me and thought I was crazy. Just poor service. This is clearly not luxury service.
